# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly enhance your daily life or work experience. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be invaluable to you. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value I believe it will bring to you. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in making this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
